category: Human Rights Management Regulations/Article 4 (Guaranteeing the right to participate in sports)
contents: Article 4 (Guaranteeing the right to participate in sports) ① The Sports Council supports the participation of all citizens, including vulnerable groups, in sports activities by strengthening the public nature and social value of major projects. ② Deleted 2019. 11. 7. ③ The Sports Association strives to promote women’s participation in sports and develop policies, including by increasing the proportion of women in the board of directors and various advisory committees.
